duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead, manage, and grow the US sales and account management team.
Initiate and cultivate long-term customer relationships within the US banking market at a T1/T2 level.
Work with the Account Management Team to leverage existing multinational clients for new US business.
Take ownership of the customer journey, from the very first call to the seamless activation of their live services.
Attend industry events & speak/present on Form3’s behalf around the product, value for potential customers, etc.
Develop and strengthen partner relationships to drive commercial success and elevate the esteemed Form3 brand.
Drive market communications, execute impactful sales campaigns, and share company news through an extensive network.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Sales, or a related field (Master's preferred)
